name: Lord Mumbo Jumps
description:
Hey everyone,

Recently I saw mumbo jumbos video on making a TV in minecraft, in which he made a game. Here's my attempt at making it.

The Game is simple, avoid the magma blocks. You would spawn close to where the text is.

Keybinds:

W=Move up

A=Move left

S=Move down

D=Move right

Escape=Quit the game

Delete=Pause the game

Enter=Enter  or Re-Enter the game

R=Restart the game

Feel free to post any questions in the comments.
